author: yorickdowne
content:
Lido have stated they'll have the ability for their permissioned operators to initiate consolidations by mid-2026 - right around Glamsterdam, give or take a few months

<https://blog.lido.fi/lidos-roadmap-to-pectra-delivering-validator-consolidations-in-the-protocol/>

Their stVault / v3 supports compounding validators now, but that's not where the bulk of stake is

RocketPool aren't anywhere close to even thinking about consolidations

Stakewise v4 would support compounding validators. I don't know whether there's a concrete roadmap for that.

I see institutional users interested in 512-ETH validators when spinning up new ones, to get the compounding effect.
